Name: GRANDMA
About the game: Join the battle to save earth from aliens and robots. Choose to play on the side of humans or aliens in battle. 1. Choose a side whether humans or robots/aliens 2. Choose a main weapon, secondary and lethal options to optimize your chances of success 3. Play alongside up to 50 online players 4. Choose various levels 5. Play in various modes such a s capture the king, rush, team deathmatch, conquest. Other Game on steam 'Restaurant SImulator'
